description: A React-like functional component written in TypeScript using the Qwik framework. The component named 'RouterHead' manages and renders the contents of the document's `<head>` section dynamically, including title, meta tags, links, styles, and scripts, based on the current document head state and location.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Creates a Qwik component that manages document head based on reactive state and hooks.
